relationships.description: Harry is having a conversation with Dumbledore about Horcruxes.
Tom Riddle was the past version of Voldemort, who was trying to become immortal.
Voldemort created Horcruxes in order to achieve immortality.
Harry is concerned about the existence of Horcruxes and their connection to Voldemort's immortality.
